Package egl

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IDisposable
    Represents Objects Whose Resource Are Not Automatically Freed By The GC
    IVertexType
    Common Interleaved Vertex Functionality
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ArrayBind
    Provides Information About A Component Inside Of A Vertex Struct For Correctly Binding Buffers To Programs
    BlendState
    OpenGL State For Pixel Blending Functions
    DepthState
    OpenGL State For Depth-Buffer Reading, Writing, And Testing
    GL
    MEGA-ENUM Hierarchy For OpenGL Enums (Most Of The Important Ones)
    GL.BlendEquationMode
    Enum For Setting General Pixel Blending Operation
    GL.BlendingFactorDest
    Enum For Setting Multiplicative Factor Of Destination Pixel In Blend Equation
    GL.BlendingFactorSrc
    Enum For Setting Multiplicative Factor Of Source Pixel In Blend Equation
    GL.BufferTarget
    Enum For Classifying OpenGL Buffer Objects
    GL.BufferUsageHint
    Enum For Hinting At OpenGL Where To Place Data
    GL.CullFaceMode
    Enum For Specifying Which Faces Of A Triangle To Cull
    GL.DepthFunction
    Enum For Depth Value Comparisons Used To Determine Pixel Output
    GL.DrawBufferMode
    Enum For Specifying Pixel Output Location
    GL.EnableCap
    Enum For Toggling OpenGL Pipeline Features
    GL.ErrorCode
    Enum For General OpenGL Errors
    GL.FramebufferAttachment
    Enum For Describing Texture-To-Framebuffer Attachments
    GL.FramebufferErrorCode
    Enum For Errors With The OpenGL Framebuffer Objects
    GL.FramebufferTarget
    Enum For Classifying OpenGL Framebuffer Objects
    GL.FrontFaceDirection
    Enum For Specifying What Vertex Winding Leads To A Front Face On A Triangle
    GL.GetProgramParameterName
    Enum For Retrieving Properties Of OpenGL Program Objects
    GL.GLType
    Enum For Various OpenGL Primitive Types
    GL.PixelFormat
    Enum For Pixel Representation Of External Texture Memory
    GL.PixelInternalFormat
    Enum For Internal Pixel Representation Of OpenGL Texture Objects
    GL.PixelType
    Enum For Representing Pixel Component Types
    GL.PrimitiveType
    Enum For Specifying Topology And Render Method Of The Input Data
    GL.RenderbufferStorage
    Enum For Data Type Of OpenGL Renderbuffer Objects
    GL.RenderbufferTarget
    Enum For Classifying OpenGL Renderbuffer Objects
    GL.ShaderParameter
    Enum For Retrieving Properties Of OpenGL Shader Objects
    GL.ShaderType
    Enum For Classifying OpenGL Shader Objects
    GL.TextureMagFilter
    Enum For OpenGL Texture Magnification Sampling
    GL.TextureMinFilter
    Enum For OpenGL Texture Minification Sampling
    GL.TextureParameterName
    Enum For Specifying Properties Of An OpenGL Texture Object
    GL.TextureTarget
    Enum For Classifying OpenGL Texture Objects
    GL.TextureUnit
    Enum For Pointing OpenGL Texture Objects Towards A GPU Texture Unit
    GL.TextureWrapMode
    Enum For OpenGL Texture Wrapping Mode
    GLBuffer
    Wrapper For An OpenGL Vertex Array Object And Multiple Buffer Objects
    GLDiagnostic
    A Log For OpenGL Diagnostic Information
    GLError
    OpenGL Error Checker
    GLProgram  
    GLRenderTarget  
    GLState  
    GLTexture  
    GLUniform
    Aids In Eliminating Code From Setting Certain OpenGL Uniform Data
    GLUtil  
    NativeMem
    Wrapper For Providing Correct Native Memory Within Java
    RasterizerState
    OpenGL State For Specifying Triangle Culling And Orientation
    SamplerState
    OpenGL State For Texture Sampling Methods
    Semantic
    All Necessary Semantic Attribute Enums (Type | Index)
    ShaderInterface
    Interface For Communicating Semantic Information Between Programs And Vertex Buffer
    SpriteBatch  
    SpriteGlyph
    A Sprite Instance
    SpriteSortMode
    Specifies Sprite Ordering When Drawing Them Via SpriteBatch
    VertexSpriteBatch  
    VertexUtils
    Provides Common Method To Append Elements Into A ByteBuffer
